title: Bug 104630: Column icons not visible when connecting to Derby database
description: When connecting to a Derby database in the Data Source, the column icons are not visible in the Available Items section.
OB: Column icons are not visible in the Available Items section after connecting to a Derby database.
EB: When expanding the Data Source in the Available Items section, the table icons and column icons should be visible.
SR:
Steps to reproduce:
1. Create a new project.
2. Create a new report.
3. Open the Data Explorer view.
4. In the Data Explorer view, create a new Data Source and connect to a Derby database using the following details:
   - Driver Class: com.ibm.db2.jcc.DB2Driver
   - Database URL: jdbc:db2://spmdb:1527/gui
   - User Name: root
   - Password: root
5. After setting up the Data Source, create a dataset.
6. In the Edit Data Set window, select the Query option.
